subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which famous king from Rajasthan was known for his military conquests?

explanation_en: Rao Jodha is known for his role in the construction of the Mecca Masjid and the Jain temple complex in Jaisalmer, Rajasthan. This king was famous for his military conquests and strategic planning during the Rajputana period.
